title.rendered: All ways to generate random numbers

content.rendered:
Raffles, sweepstakes and other games of chance are based on the random number generation that give equal chances of winning to all its participants. Of course, the choice of these numbers can be left to innocent hands, but since the technology and its algorithms are more independent, we will surely have more confidence than in the human factor.

In the following lines we are going to share different methods so that you can generate random numbers whatever the case in which you need them and in different ways, so that you can choose the one that suits you best.

Google search engine

In Google, we will only have to write «RNG» in the search bar (random number generator) or «Google random number generator» and we will see a module appear similar to the one that appears when we write a mathematical operation and launches a calculator, changes of measurement units, etc.

Google RNG

Then we will get a simple but effective tool that allows us to indicate the minimum and maximum number and a button to generate the number. You even have the option to share this tool via link, social networks or email.

random number websites

As the saying goes, “if something doesn’t exist on the Internet, it’s because it hasn’t been invented yet.” No sooner said than done. There is a huge variety of websites dedicated to random number generation.

Web Get lucky

For example, in Get lucky you can easily write in text boxes the minimum number, maximum number and the number of random results that you want to be generated.

Other alternatives are Augeweb, generaterandomnumbers, WikiNumber and many more. If you have used the Google module that we told you about earlier, below you will find many other search results with websites dedicated to this purpose.

Browser extensions for random numbers

If you make frequent use of random number generation, you may prefer to use a fixed tool anchored to your browser.

There is a wide variety and each one offers basically the same thing, so based on user ratings and being featured in the Chrome store, we are going to recommend “Random Number Generator”, a pretty descriptive extension name.

This random number generator is a useful tool to get a number from a desired range. You can also use it to generate a random color, random password, random name, random country, or random word.

in Excel

Yes, the spreadsheet tool that is part of the Microsoft Office suite also allows you to solve these random number generation problems.

Excel random numbers

To do this, enter the following formula:

=RANDOM.BETWEEN(lower,upper)

Enter the formula in the cell and then the lower and upper values ​​between which you want the numbers to be generated.
